EVALUATION D'UN PROJET DE
            DEVELOPPEMENT DE L'ELEVAGE

abstracts.cdata!:
The project, carried out over five
            years, 1976-80, would comprise: (a) establishing nine group
            ranches and a group ranch development center; (b) providing
            improved veterinary services throughout Dedougou and
            Bobo-Dioulasso ORD regions; (c) constructing a livestock
            market and holding ground at Bobo-Dioulasso as well as
            improving 730 km of stock routes; (d) renovating a
            slaughterhouse at Bobo-Dioulasso; and (e) providing for
            training, field trials, project evaluation and monitoring,
            and future project preparation.
